key_events: Artie fails to retrieve a bag of Zesty Ranch Glitch-O's from the Snack-Master 4000.
Artie performs 'Percussive Maintenance' on the machine to no avail.
Artie places his Leather Wallet on the machine's ledge to free his hands.
Artie reaches into the delivery chute and touches a loose internal wire.
A massive electrical surge fatally electrocutes Artie.
Artie's Leather Wallet falls to the floor as he collapses.
The mundane world pixelates and dissolves into blackness as Artie dies.
Artie encounters Fizz, a snarky System Guide, in the server-room-scented void.
The System presents a Point Buy UI with 10 available stat points.
Artie mistakes 'Critical Hit Rate' for a performance metric and dumps all points into it.
The System confirms the build, locking Artie at 1/1 HP and 100% Crit Rate.
Artie earns the title 'Statistical Anomaly' and the 'Glass Cannon' build designation.
The Tutorial Quest 'Survive the Spawn' is initiated as the void dissolves.
Artie is dropped from the void into a lush forest tutorial zone.
Artie spawns in the Lush Forest with his Corporate ID Badge and Cracked Smartphone.
The System initiates the 'Survive the Spawn' quest.
Artie confirms his stats: Level 1, 1/1 HP, and 100% Crit Rate.
A Lesser Puddle Slime (Lvl 1) aggros on Artie.
Artie successfully dodges the slime's first leap, consuming 5 stamina.
Artie is cornered against a thicket of thorns as the slime prepares a second lunge.
Artie dodged multiple attacks from a Level 1 slime, depleting his stamina to 60.
Artie missed five consecutive attacks, demonstrating his lack of combat skill.
Artie landed a 'Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit' that dealt 9,999,999,999 damage.
The slime and a massive ancient tree were vaporized by the attack.
Artie reached Level 2 and restored his resources, gaining 5 stat points and 1 skill point.
The System issued a reality stability warning as the value decreased to 44%.
Artie acquired the Participation Trophy (Cursed) in his left hand.
The System applied the 'Monster Beacon' and 'Marked for Death' statuses to Artie.
Artie's Aggro Meter reached 100%, triggering a zone-wide hunt.
Artie began a high-stakes sprint toward the gates of Oakhaven.
Artie's stamina dropped to 60/100 during the chase.
The System initiated the 'Run for Your Life!' quest.
Artie reached the Oakhaven gates with critical stamina depletion while pursued by a monster horde.
Guards Ted and Bill delayed entry to gamble on Artie's survival odds against the approaching monsters.
The Oakhaven Automated Defense scanner verified Artie's 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate, flagging him as a Paradoxical Anomaly.
Artie completed the 'Run for Your Life!' quest upon entering the city seconds before the gate dropped.
The city gate dropped like a guillotine, killing the lead wolf of the pursuing horde.
Artie received 50 XP, 10 Silver, and the 'Gate-Crasher' title (Inactive) as quest rewards.
Artie entered the Mayor's office and was scanned, confirming his Paradoxical Anomaly status.
The Mayor explained the economic value of Crits in Oakhaven's society.
The Mayor offered the 'Cloak of the Bureaucrat' as a way to mask Artie's Anomaly signature.
Artie's Aggro Meter rose to 92% as the Participation Trophy continued to hum.
Artie reluctantly agreed to hear the terms of the Mayor's deal to ensure his survival.
Artie exited the Mayor's office and was immediately confronted by Vane in the Town Square.
Vane's stats were revealed: Level 45 with the 'Top 100 Slayer' title.
Artie successfully dodged Vane's horizontal strike by tripping over a cobblestone.
Artie triggered a Critical Hit with Percussive Maintenance to collapse a stack of crates, blocking the alleyway.
Artie escaped to a residential backstreet, where his Aggro Meter began to decrease from its peak of 96%.
Vane was left behind in the alley, frustrated and intrigued by Artie's survival.
